TopicTitle: What would you do if you were all of a sudden banned from the forum?

Articles.Content:
Me?

Cry for about 1 hour, then feel sick for the rest of my life.
Most of my enjoyment on these forums actually comes from reading, so I wouldn\'t be too hurt. I still like voicing my opinion sometimes, so it would be a bummer, but not a huge hit.

Shrug my shoulders and find another forum?

Look, I like KSP, but it\'s not the centre piece of my life or anything!

Wonder what I did wrong.

Watch a youtube video.

Contact Nova.

Make a KSP Music Video.

Somehow get back on the forum.
I would make a gigantic mod pack while I\'m gone and be bigger than Nova! And I would do it in paint too!
